cfp-mentor-team.title: Announcing the CFP Mentoring Team!
cfp-mentor-team.summary: I’m so proud and happy to announce our CFP Mentors for 2015. This great group will be available for office hours or chat to help you with anything CFP related!

changing-our-cfp.title: Why we’re changing our CFP process
changing-our-cfp.summary: We’re aiming for even more unique content from each speaker, consistently high presentation quality, and diverse types of sessions. We want to keep our attendees engaged, inspired, and in the conversation.

welcome-elyse-holladay.title: Elyse Holladay curating 2015 Speaker Selection!
welcome-elyse-holladay.summary: We’re aiming for even more unique content from each speaker, consistently high presentation quality, and diverse types of sessions. We want to keep our attendees engaged, inspired, and in the conversation.

cfp-2015-open.title: The 2015 CFP is open... and all new!
cfp-2015-open.summary: We’re aiming for even more unique content from each speaker, consistently high presentation quality, and diverse types of sessions. We want to keep our attendees engaged, inspired, and in the conversation.
